entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as a fellow Gryffindor in the dormitory. ("The slow, deep breathing of his fellow Gryffindors.")

entities.name: padfoot
entities.description: Padfoot is not explicitly mentioned in this passage, but it is likely a reference to Sirius Black's nickname.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is described as waking up in his dormitory. ("arry was the first to awake in his dormitory next morning.")

entities.name: gryffindors
entities.description: Gryffindor is a house at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned as the group that Harry and Percy are part of. ("The slow, deep breathing of his fellow Gryffindors.")

entities.name: harry's schoolbag
entities.description: Harry's schoolbag is mentioned as something he pulls out parchment and quill from. ("He opened his schoolbag carefully, pulled out parchment and quill...")

relationships.description: Harry and Percy are mentioned as fellow Gryffindors in the dormitory. ("The slow, deep breathing of his fellow Gryffindors.")
Harry is a member of the Gryffindor house at Hogwarts. ("The slow, deep breathing of his fellow Gryffindors.")
Harry is likely friends with Padfoot, who is mentioned as a nickname for Sirius Black. ("Padfoot is not explicitly mentioned in this passage...")
